Articles.Content:
What am I meant to do when I can't load certain craft files with the following error:

> 
> Craft SSTO IV was not loaded 
> because [random line break here]
> 
> it had the following parts missing:
> 
> toroidalFuelTank

The only button says 'OK'.

I took a short break from KSP for maybe 2-3 months.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-21T11:12:56Z" title="07/21/2015 11:12  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 21, 2015</time> by THX1138**
Check if it is still in your game. Go to Squad, parts, and fuel tanks, and see if it is there.

That message shows up when the part's data files go missing from KSP's GameData folder. You'll want to reinstall KSP, either by having Steam verify the local game cache, or by reinstalling from your store download.

I don't recall if Squad did any reshuffling between 1.0 and 1.0.4 (or, for that matter, between 0.90 and 1.0), but if they did and the part definition got moved, thus confusing your old ship designs, then I think you'll need to reconstruct them. Think of it as an opportunity to improve on the originals.
Validating the local game cache in Steam fixed the problem. Thanks!
